#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n];
        int steps=0,i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            steps = steps + a[i]/(i+1);
        }
        if(steps%2==0)
            printf("BOB\n");
        else
            printf("ALICE\n");

    }
    return 0;
}
